subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is the founder of Amer Fort?
question_hi: अमेर के पत्र कौन वितीसी के निवास करें।
explanation_en: Pratap Singh, also known as Rao Jodh Singh, was the founder of Amer Fort, also known as Amer Fort in Hindi. The fort is a historical monument in Jaipur, Rajasthan, India.
